metadata.title: CVE-2020-6106 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An exploitable information disclosure vulnerability exists in the init_node_manager functionality of F2fs-Tools F2fs.Fsck 1.12 and 1.13. A specially crafted filesystem can be used to disclose information. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
